title.rendered: Application Questions Answered : Video : From Bridge Careers

content.rendered:
This quick video answers so many questions you may have about filling out applications. Cory goes through numerous blunders that happen on applications that he sees all the time. Don’t let that be you!

<iframe loading="lazy" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/2vgrOrLvZ4c" width="560" height="315" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="allowfullscreen"></iframe>

excerpt.rendered: This quick video answers so many questions you may have about filling out applications. Cory goes through numerous blunders that happen on applications that he sees all the time. Don’t let that be you!
